artist: Artist: Christopher Cook; Author: Christopher Cook; Publisher: Eden Project / Arts Council of England, University of Plymouth; Printer: Co-published and printed by Maslands, Ltd., Tiverton, England; Book Binder: Peter Franklin , Broadclyst, England
creditline: Gift of the Artist and Mary Ryan Gallery, New York
description: small book with green hard cover; printed poem facing drawings reminiscent of magnified microrganisms and plant structures; paper slipcover printed in red and green snakeskin-like pattern
signed: on colophon page, in black ink: [84 / Christopher Cook]
title: A Thoroughbred Golden Calf
